channel.title: Cloud Computing on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Computing on FinanClub

item.title: IBM
item.description: score:148 Chances: Shares of IBM (IBM) are trading higher on Tuesday after Bank of America issued a bullish note on the company.The analyst behind the note claims that IBM is repositioned for substantial growth, thanks in part to its use of AI.Industry players like IBM, HPE and AGYS are gaining from the increased demand for integrated solutions and the growing adoption of the multi-cloud model, despite persistent supply chain constraints.

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:231 Chances: Oracle (ORCL) has been recognized as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: U.S. Electronic Health Record (EHR) 2023-2024 Vendor Assessment, indicating potential for growth in the healthcare sector. Leading healthcare organizations are implementing Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite, suggesting a potential increase in customer base and revenue.
